import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import './global.css'; import './App.css'; import './Sidebar.css'; import './Main.css'; function App() { const [latitude, setLatitude] = useState(''); const [longitude, setLongitude] = useState(''); const [github_username, setGithubUsername] = useState(''); const [techs, setTechs] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition( (position) => { const {latitude, longitude} = position.coords; setLatitude(latitude); setLongitude(longitude); }, (err) => { console.log(err); }, { timeout: 30000, } ); }, []); return (
